name: Create Clust applications from new Google Sheets rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and create Clust applications. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cMVVsk7MU3Gbse8iRtAxHu8zaezgOhtzoSxAgmSWsIw/edit?usp=sharing).
